00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Data;
00024 using System.Collections;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Database;
00029 
00030 using NyFolder;
00031 using NyFolder.Utils;
00032 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.BuddyList {
00035     public class AccountsTable : DbTable {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Constructors
00038         // ============================================
00040         public AccountsTable() : base("accounts") {
00041         }
00042 
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PUBLIC Methods
00045         // ============================================
00047         public string[] GetAllAccounts() {
00048             string sql = "SELECT username FROM accounts;";
00049             return(db.ExecuteReadStrings(sql));
00050         }
00051 
00053         public int GetUserId (string username) {
00054             string sql = "SELECT id FROM accounts WHERE username=@Name;";
00055             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00056             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00057             return(db.ExecuteReadInt(sql, sqlParams));
00058         }
00059 
00061         public string GetUserName (int id) {
00062             string sql = "SELECT username FROM accounts WHERE id=@Id;";
00063             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00064             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00065             return(db.ExecuteReadString(sql, sqlParams));
00066         }
00067 
00069         public string GetPassword (int id) {
00070             string sql = "SELECT password FROM accounts WHERE id=@Id;";
00071             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00072             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00073             return(db.ExecuteReadString(sql, sqlParams));
00074         }
00075 
00077         public string GetPassword (string username) {
00078             string sql = "SELECT password FROM accounts WHERE username=@Name;";
00079             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00080             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00081             return(db.ExecuteReadString(sql, sqlParams));
00082         }
00083 
00085         public void SetPassword (int id, string password) {
00086             string sql = "UPDATE accounts SET password=@Password WHERE id=@Id;";
00087             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00088             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00089             sqlParams.Add("@Password", password);
00090             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00091         }
00092 
00094         public void SetPassword (string username, string password) {
00095             string sql = "UPDATE accounts SET password=@Password WHERE username=@Name;";
00096             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00097             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00098             sqlParams.Add("@Password", password);
00099             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00100         }
00101 
00103         public int Insert (string username, string password) {
00104             try {
00105                 string sql = "INSERT INTO accounts (username, password) VALUES (@Name, @Password);";
00106                 Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00107                 sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00108                 sqlParams.Add("@Password", password);
00109                 return(db.ExecuteNonQueryGetID(sql, sqlParams));
00110             } catch {
00111                 return(-1);
00112             }
00113         }
00114 
00116         public void Remove (int id) {
00117             string sql = "DELETE from accounts WHERE id=@Id;";
00118             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00119             sqlParams.Add("@Id", id);
00120             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00121         }
00122 
00124         public void Remove (string username) {
00125             string sql = "DELETE from accounts WHERE username=@Name;";
00126             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00127             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00128             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00129         }
00130 
00131         // ============================================
00132         // PROTECTED Methods
00133         // ============================================
00134         // +----------+------------------+
00135         // | id       | INTEGER          |
00136         // +----------+------------------+
00137         // | username | VARCHAR(32 + 24) |
00138         // +----------+------------------+
00139         // | password | VARCHAR(32)      |
00140         // +----------+------------------+
00141         protected override void CreateAccountsTable() {
00142             string sql = "CREATE TABLE accounts (" +
00143                             "id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL," +
00144                             "username VARCHAR(56) NOT NULL UNIQUE," +
00145                             "password VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL" +
00146                          ");";
00147             db.ExecuteNonQuery(sql);
00148         }
00149     }
00150 }
